question: There should be a stronger common EU law on data protection.
name: Data protection

question: The EU should promote the introduction of a minimum wage linked to the average salary in each member state.
name: Minimum wage

question: The European Parliament should have the power to introduce laws without asking the European Commission.
name: Legislation

question: The EU should set stricter targets for CO2 reduction.
name: CO2 Emission

question: EU member states should not be allowed to subsidise nuclear power.
name: Nuclear Energy

question: Growing genetically-modified crops should be allowed throughout the European Union.
name: GMOs

question: Import taxes on agricultural products from developing countries should be lowered.
name: Custom duties

question: The President of the European Commission should be elected by citizens of the EU in direct elections.
name: President of the Commission

question: A minimum corporation tax rate should be introduced throughout the EU.
name: Corporate minimum tax

question: There should be less financial assistance to poorer regions within the EU.
name: Domestic supports

question: The European Union should not accept any new member states.
name: EU enlargement

question: The EU should introduce a tax on financial transactions.
name: Tax of financial transactions

question: EU member states should create a European army.
name: European army

question: The European Parliament should be able to sack individual commissioners.
name: Dismissal of commissioners

question: More foreign policy areas should be agreed at an EU level.
name: Common Foreign Polcy

question: The EU should increase the amount of money it spends on foreign aid.
name: EU aid for the poor

question: There should be Eurobonds, whereby all Eurozone countries can be guarantors when one of them takes out a loan.
name: Eurobonds

question: Member states must recognise same-sex marriages conducted in other EU countries.
name: Same-sex marriage

question: The rules for accommodating asylum-seekers should be the same in every EU country.
name: Asylum issues

question: The EU should be able to raise European taxes to replace member states contributions.
name: European taxes

question: EU should not react to the situation in Ukraine.
name: Situation in Ukraine

question: Establishment of the United States of Europe is the final purpose of the European Union.
name: United States of Europe

question: The Erasmus program should be extended to secondary schools as well.
name: Erasmus

question: The same level of VAT tax should be introduce in all EU Member States.
name: VAT tax

question: All member countries should get the opportunity to restrict the number of employees from other EU countries.
name: Number of foreigner employees

question: Hungary should adopt the Euro as soon as possible.
name: Introduction of euro

question: MEP's should be elected by voting for European parties.
name: EP-elections

question: The European Union must be empowered to punish by withdrawal of funds the Member States violating the democratic rules.
name: Democratic minimum

question: The EU Member States need a common energy policy.
name: Energy policy

question: Border control should be abolished in all EU Member States.
name: Abolition of borders
